quote: It bothered me that we behaved differently when other people were at the arcade. It bothered me that we had to be different at different times. I wished we could always be ourselves.
quote_letters: IT BOTHERED ME THAT WE BEHAVED DIFFERENTLY WHEN OTHER PEOPLE WERE AT THE ARCADE IT BOTHERED ME THAT WE HAD TO BE DIFFERENT AT DIFFERENT TIMES I WISHED WE COULD ALWAYS BE OURSELVES
